anfrss.anffeed module¶

Core Module of package. Supports several languages:

  • English

  • German

  • Kurmanji

  • Spanish

( More languages available soon. )

class

ANFFeed

See docs of containing class/es to learn more about.

download_article(ident, target, file='html')¶

Download Article

Requests a chosen article and writes it to a file (default: HTML).

Parameters

  • ident (str) – Identifier; Can be link or title which will identify the article to down- load

  • target (str) – Directory to write to

  • file (str, default) – The desired file type to write
